text: Waldshut-Tiengen (Alemannic: Waldshuet-Düenge) is a city in southwestern Baden-Württemberg right at the Swiss border. It is the capital and largest city in Waldshut and a middle centre in the surrounding area. Waldshut-Tiengen is at the edge of the southern Black Forest and is on the banks of the Rhine River. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of the town of Waldshut-Tiengen * Waldshut-Tiengen: pictures & history Category:Waldshut (district)
title: Waldshut-Tiengen
